attributes.action: Petition to abolish the BBC licence fee.
attributes.additional_details: TV subscriptions have changed' this is no longer a one company choice!
attributes.background: Consumers now have a choice of subscribing to  Sky- BT- Virgin' we no longer need to pay the BBC for a licence with so much choice' the customer can decide who he or she wishes to subscribe to' it is now time to abolish this unfair tax!  £145.50 or receive a fine' criminal!!
